msg: Create initial build instructions and update versions in property files to match build instructions.

author: billbarker
msg: Remove the setting of base.path from here.

Setting it here overrides the setting in build.properties.  If there is no build.properties, then the build.properties.default (same as this one) takes.  However, my poor littly Windows box doesn't have a /usr/local directory :-).
